SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel

Class Lightifier

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.Lightifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Lightifier extends Object implements Serializable
This class is used to convert Object present in the Model to the corresponding LightObject present in the LightModel so that a client can only have the information it needs to display the game
See Also:

      public static LightHand lightifyYour(Hand hand, Codex codex)
      Parameters:

      codex - from which get the playability
